title: Persuasive/Deceptive Visualization
description: Visualized and debated oil dependence in Arab economies using comparative bar charts.

title: Flight Delay Analysis
description: A group project that analyzed flight delay patterns using PySpark on a large Kaggle dataset.

title: How Much of My Closet is Thrifted?
description: Created a personal dataset to analyze my wardrobe composition and quantify how much of it was thrifted. Used Excel for tracking and data visualization to explore patterns across item categories and sources.

title: Fitness Data EDA
description: Explored trends using a fitness dataset, applying NumPy, Pandas, and Seaborn for EDA, and Scikit-learn for predictive modeling.
tools: Numpy, Pandas, Matplotlib, Seaborn, Scikit-learn (Logistic regression)

title: Global Happiness Score EDA
description: Performed exploratory data analysis on world happiness data using NumPy, Pandas, and Seaborn. Visualized relationships between economy, life expectancy, freedom, and overall happiness scores across regions.

title: Bikewatching - Geospatial Visualization
description: A fully interactive Mapbox and D3.js visualization that maps Boston’s Bluebikes network, showing station traffic volumes, directional flow patterns (arrivals vs. departures), and time-based activity using a dynamic slider and data filtering.

title: Using CTL Induced Cytotoxicity to Analyze Caspase-3 Activity in Naïve and Pathogen Mice
description: Conducted an immunology experiment to measure Caspase-3 activity in naïve and pathogen-infected mice using a cytotoxic T lymphocyte (CTL) assay. Prepared and incubated target cells with effector CTLs to assess apoptosis via spectrophotometric absorbance. Compared Caspase-3 activity levels to evaluate immune response mechanisms and identify the pathogen type.

title: Grocery Store Comparison Visualization Assignment
description: Created price comparison visualizations for grocery items across stores and categories.
